title: Is there a way I could get augment caches for free?
body: I was Searching through the  League of legends store one day when I found Augment Caches. Is there a way that I could Somehow get 1 for free? all i need is 65 more RP to get the last icon, The decryptor Icon. then I will get the Last augment Cache Fragment and get my augment Cache.

replies.body: We can't provide a free augment cache, but we may be able to help in another way!  Hit us up in a [support ticket,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do for your specific request!
Is there a way to earn Augmented chest fragments other than from the 3 icons, because as far as I know the next chest that is coming in a couple of days will contain 2 chest fragments?
